content: this pattern was inspired by lionbrand l40247 and my love of slip_stitch knitting the debbie bliss tonals were begging to be knit into a blanket combining multiple easter colours i wanted to make a blanket that could be used in a stroller or car seat and i favour a border around a blanket so after much calculating the pastille baby was created the needle size is larger than usual for the yarn this keeps the stitch pattern soft and squishy the result was a scrumptious cozy blanket warning this is addictive knitting seeing how the colours blend together
